title: PSA - Master Yi's Highlander Grants him Immunity to Attack Speed Slows
body:
Just had a game where my mid laner was confused when I said {{champion:11}} was a hard counter to {{champion:20}} . He says "But your E, R, Frozen Heart!"

I of course calmly explain to him that Master Yi is immune to all of this. But he still rages that I didn't buy Frozen Heart against Yi after we got stomped in the first twenty minutes.

Then in the end game screen, my top, mid **and the Yi player** all tell me that Master Yi is only immune to movement speed slows during his ult.

So PSA - Master Yi is immune to all attack speed slows, the slow applied by fear and the slow applied by polymorph during his ult. You're welcome.

replies.body: He is and it's very annoying. But Yi is weak right now so I can't complain about him.
Oh this isn't like a 'cry about how strong Yi is' thread. This is a 'cry about how uninformed some players are' thread.
Like how no one knows that Poppy's w stops dashes. I mean none of my friends who have been playing league longer than I have know so.

How.
 
That is literally what the spell is designed for, and the main use of it! The Master Yi thing makes sense, as AS slows are not specified in his ult, but the ability specifically says that it blocks dashes(and enemies from going through bard tunnels, which counts as a dash I guess)

Ahhh, like when my adc gets combod by Leona and her adc and is like "what is that burst" 
"leonas passive" "what is leonas passive" "its burst"
Quick tip: If you want to have a laugh, tell the enemy Yi to build Guinsoo's.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-11-27T20:24:35.364+0000)
>
> Quick tip: If you want to have a laugh, tell the enemy Yi to build Guinsoo's.

this is just wrong.

Guinsoo's Rageblade is bugged on him at the moment.

It will return on-hit effects (i.e. Bloodrazor, Ruined King, Wuju Style, Black Cleaver, Frozen Mallet) to Master Yi.

That is why it would be humorous.

That's absolutely hilarious.

Didn't realize that many people still built rageblade on him though.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-27T21:17:30.752+0000)
>
> Guinsoo's Rageblade is bugged on him at the moment.
> 
> It will return on-hit effects (i.e. Bloodrazor, Ruined King, Wuju Style, Black Cleaver, Frozen Mallet) to Master Yi.
> 
> That is why it would be humorous.

you forgot wit's end
that... doesn't make sense, hes stealing MR from himself xD

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-11-27T20:24:35.364+0000)
>
> Quick tip: If you want to have a laugh, tell the enemy Yi to build Guinsoo's.

Guinsoo's isn't that bad right now I don't think.

With bloodrazor and guinsoo's alone he reaches the attack speed cap while ulting, letting him stack a bunch of damage/defense items, and use defensive boots. It's pretty nice.
it's not that it's a bad item, it's that Guinsoo's is bugged on Yi and makes him take all the on hit damage he's dealing

> [{quoted}](name=Kosm1K,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=0000000100020000,timestamp=2016-11-28T03:07:58.231+0000)
>
> it's not that it's a bad item, it's that Guinsoo's is bugged on Yi and makes him take all the on hit damage he's dealing

Yeah I wasn't aware at the time, shit's fucking awful. Rito pls fix.

> [{quoted}](name=PermabannedGaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=00000001000200000000,timestamp=2016-11-28T03:10:16.909+0000)
>
> Yeah I wasn't aware at the time, shit's fucking awful. Rito pls fix.

So why did I get downvoted for saying that a bug that destroys any Yi that builds guinsoo's needs to be fixed?
There are some salty assholes on boards

They downvoted you too. People will downvote every post above theirs in a thread to artificially raise theirs in substitution of upvotes. But I upvoted ya back to 1, and I'm sure others did too. Reason triumphs over saltiness!
You wanna know what more annoying than attack speed slows? Abilities that only say they slow when they also slow attack speed as well.
like what ability? sry I cant follow
He may be immune to the fear's slow but he will still flee in the opposite direction at sonic speed lmao
Back when Hide and Seek still existed, if a seeker picked Yi, I'd always grab Fid (even though he's not really an optimal hider).  Fearing Yi is waaaaaaaay too fun.
He is also immune to anivia's e double damage when Yi is in her ulti
I feel like that's dumb
She can still proc the double E damage by stunning him with Q

I don't think the Ult issue still exists, though. It moved the bonus damage to trigger by "chill" debuff, not slow or stun status.

The way the E was once worded, "Deals double damage to targets slowed or stunned by Q or R"

Now, her Q and R (at full size iirc) apply "chill" debuff, which triggers the bonus damage.
Didn't know this. At least she still has her Q E though.

I had a fun game where I was {{champion:25}} supporting a {{champion:21}}  and the enemy team had a {{champion:51}} .

At one point Cait ulted MF and I was behind her so I couldn't bodyblock it. 
MF died and then bitched me out the rest of the game for not shielding her.
Morgana's shield blocks magic damage and debuffs- it does nothing to physical damage- which is what Cait ult does.

> Morgana's shield blocks magic damage and debuffs-

Actually it doesn't block debuffs only CC
Found that out the hard way when I self-shielded and stepped on a Cait trap to clear it, then got head-shotted anyway.
Fun Fact: Yi is not immune to Charm's slowing property.

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-11-27T21:26:51.406+0000)
>
> Fun Fact: Yi is not immune to Charm's slowing property.

Normal champion: "Whoa..." _staggers towards Ahri_
Highlander Yi: "Let me love you!" _sprints_
Damn you, it's 11PM here and I almost woke my wife up laughing at that.

> [{quoted}](name=Darien Juranas,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=000b00000000,timestamp=2016-11-28T04:10:16.793+0000)
>
> Damn you, it's 11PM here and I almost woke my wife up laughing at that.

Really glad I could crack you up! That makes me laugh too!

Also, we're in the same timezone. I'm PA, you?

RI.

....don't look at me like that, it's a real state. Two senators and everything.

As a former RI citizen, I feel you. 

It's so small people forget about it.

Yeah, people keep picking {{champion:54}}  into me and I freaking love it.

If you really want to ruin Yi's day pick {{champion:9}} to make him run away with 600 ms for 2 seconds with Q or {{champion:33}}  because you will just make him kill himself faster with Guinsoo's than he already does by himself, since you will proc W on every double strike and phantom hit.

Wait why am I telling you this.

> [{quoted}](name=Schwarzenswagger,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-11-27T20:45:20.678+0000)
>
> Yeah, people keep picking {{champion:54}}  into me and I freaking love it.
> 
> If you really want to ruin Yi's day pick {{champion:9}} to make him run away with 600 ms for 2 seconds with Q or {{champion:33}}  because you will just make him kill himself faster with Guinsoo's than he already does by himself, since you will proc W on every double strike and phantom hit.
> 
> Wait why am I telling you this.

Yi should be able to kill Rammus in a 1v1 late game but yeah, Yi can't really team fight against a Rammus at all.
did you win the game

Oh no. I mean, I gave it my best shot and got every dragon I could but like I said in the OP, Yi is a hard counter. If there's anything skirmishers are good at, it's demolishing melee champions with outdated kits.

All other sources that I've seen on the internet tell me that Yi in Highlander is immune to the Nunu snowball debuff, since it's both a movement speed slow and another debuff. However, since Frozen Heart is just an attack speed DEBUFF, Yi is not immune to that. 

Sorry to tell you what you don't want to hear, but I think your mid laner was in the right here.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-313-notes

You are reading outdated information. In the patch notes "attack speed slows were unable to be cleansed unless they were tied to movement speed slows. Now attack slows can be cleansed and are treated as Move speed slows".

Jeez, then most of my sources were wrong because they were made after this patch... why is Google such a troll sometimes?

I was also going to ask you for an official source, but you delivered on that before I could even ask, so thanks for the backing up.

> [{quoted}](name=Eponine9,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=001900000000,timestamp=2016-11-28T13:14:11.541+0000)
>
> Jeez, then most of my sources were wrong because they were made after this patch... why is Google such a troll sometimes?
> 
> I was also going to ask you for an official source, but you delivered on that before I could even ask, so thanks for the backing up.

The fact that you couldn't find the truth through Google proves this PSA was needed.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
TYR IS totally right.

to be fair, for the longest time of his existance, yi was countered by all attackspeed slows that weren't ms slows at the same time.
Atleast for an oldtimer like me, it feels like yesterday since they changed that.

> [{quoted}](name=Don Cingulum,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mEOkqifi,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2016-11-27T23:16:45.142+0000)
>
> to be fair, for the longest time of his existance, yi was countered by all attackspeed slows that weren't ms slows at the same time.
> Atleast for an oldtimer like me, it feels like yesterday since they changed that.

That immune to all slows has been patched in [may 29, 2009](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/May_29,_2009_Patch)

Sorry to disapoint you, but that 'all slows' only reffered to movement slows, not AS slows.
It also applied to nasus wither and nunus E as their AS-debuffs where tied to the ms-slow.
Pure AS slows like FH or Malphs E were not included back then.
Befor that patch, highlander was his Q and an entierly differnt skill, while Alphastrike was his ultimate...

I'm pretty sure this is due to the attack speed slow being tied to the movement speed slow. In a Nasus wither, both the movement and attack speed slows are the same debuff, so both are removed by the yi ult. The same would apply to Olaf ult.

Or maybe I'm completely wrong.
Whatever.

You are wrong, indeed. It is all slows, including the attack speed only slow on Frozen Heart.

No offense.
